definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: An illuminated tree stands in front of the Brandenburg Gate in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 德國柏林，勃蘭登堡前的一棵璀璨奪目的聖誕樹。

sentences.english: The drink appeared at the court of the great Elector of Branden burg in 1675.
sentences.chinese: 1675年，咖啡現身於勃蘭登堡大選的法庭上。
